UsageGrantRolloverPolicy.name: UsageGrantRolloverPolicy
UsageGrantRolloverPolicy.description: Represents a policy about the rollover of a usage grant.

Code.description: A unique user-defined string for the usage grant rollover policy.

IsRolloverAllowed.description: Indicates whether the policy allows the rollover of the usage grant.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when this record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

MaximumRolloverCount.description: The maximum number of times that the usage grant can roll over.

Name.description: The name of the rollover policy record.

ShouldAllowRolloverExpiry.description: Indicates whether the rollover for the associated usage grant is allowed to expire.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the rollover policy.
